ResourceHeader.Description: This TWINS data set contains spacecraft ephemeris data in geographic as well as Geocentric Solar Magnetospheric (GSM) and Earth-centered Inertial (ECI) coordinates. Computed ephemeris elements are derived from (i) The spacecraft Raw Ephemeris File (REF), (ii) Standard geomagnetic configuration models, and (iii) Representative space environment indices. The internal geomagnetic field is modeled initially using the International Geomagnetic Reference Field (IGRF) 2005.0 adjusted for the relevant date by means of the IGRF secular variation coefficients.

InformationURL.Name: Interface page at Southwest Research Institute
